goal.tools.errorhandling

Class Resources

  • java.lang.Object
    • goal.tools.errorhandling.Resources

  • public class Resources
extends java.lang.Object
    Util class. Takes an (enumeration) element from a ResourceId, and finds the resource associated with it.
    Author:
    W.Pasman 21may2014
